title: Can we feel water in the air? - Quora

response.answer_text: Many years ago I was walking in Brisbane, Australia, on a very hot, very humid day. The air temperature was above skin temperature and, as humidity was around 100% (saturated) as the air cooled slightly on my skin water from the air condensed on my skin. It’s the only time I’ve felt it and it felt quite weird. So yes, under certain circumstances, you can feel the moisture in air.
Yes, go in a sauna and do an infusion, you will surely feel how your body feels hotter…
